Is it possible to dispatch on the abstract type of an object? I'm thinking of a scenario where you have a base method for all of type AbstractT, and a concrete method for T. Something like:

```function dostuff(t::AbstractT)
    # common manipulations
end

function dostuff(t::T)
    # specific manipulations
    dostuff(base(T))
end```
